alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 1:18PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Porthill, Elk, Chewelah, Loomis, Brewster, Methow, Rathdrum, Republic, Danville, Naples, Coolin, Eastport, Colville, Arden, Newman Lake, Bonners Ferry, Clayton, Okanogan, Oroville, Kettle Falls, Sandpoint, Wauconda, Bridgeport, Monse, Omak, Molson, Malo, Malott, Newport, Mazama, Conconully, Priest River, Winthrop, Curlew, Nighthawk, Carlton, Nespelem, Twisp, Orin, Chesaw, Deer Park, and Inchelium. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
